properties.areaDesc: Upper Niagara River and Buffalo Harbor
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 18 at 12:44PM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds to 35 knots expected.

* WHERE...The Upper Niagara River and Buffalo Harbor.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
